fields.notes: A party that accepts accountability and responsibility for the data and ensures appropriate care and maintenance of the resource
A key party responsible for gathering information and conducting research
A party who contributed to the resource other than the principal investigator
A party who can be contacted for acquiring knowledge about or acquisition of the resource
A past custodian of the data resource. This is a custom role type and will not be exported to FGP.
Those involved in data collection or data entry. Those who provided logistical support for the project. This is a custom role type and will not be exported to FGP.
Person providing IT support for data repository (e.g. ORACLE admin). This is a custom role type and will not be exported to FGP.
Anything in this database should have an assigned data manager. This is a custom role type and will not be exported to FGP.
A party who created the resource
A party that owns the resource (should always be the Crown)
A party that uses the resource
Party who authored the resource; The value of the item 413, "originator," should be used preferably to this value.
party who has processed the data in a manner such that the resource has been modified
Current not supported under HNAP; added based on DFO Data Governance Framework
